targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(rates.time),
  rates.text,
  rates.rate
FROM (
  SELECT
    funding_rates.time AS time,
    funding_rates.venue || ':' || funding_rates.product AS text,
    funding_rates.rate * 24 * 365 * 100 AS rate
  FROM funding_rates
     JOIN products ON products.symbol = funding_rates.product
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(funding_rates.time)
    AND funding_rates.venue IN ($venue)
    AND products.base IN ($base)
    AND products.quote IN ($quote)
    AND products.type = 'swap'
  UNION
  SELECT
    predicted_funding_rates.next_funding_time AS time,
    predicted_funding_rates.venue || ':' || predicted_funding_rates.product AS text,
    predicted_funding_rates.next_funding_rate * 24 * 365 * 100 AS rate
  FROM predicted_funding_rates
     JOIN products ON products.symbol = predicted_funding_rates.product
  WHERE
    predicted_funding_rates.next_funding_time > DATE_TRUNC('hour', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
    AND $__timeFilter(predicted_funding_rates.next_funding_time)
    AND predicted_funding_rates.venue IN ($venue)
    AND products.base IN ($base)
    AND products.quote IN ($quote)
    AND products.type = 'swap'
) AS rates
ORDER BY rates.time ASC

SELECT
  NOW() - interval '24 hours' AS time,
  funding_rates.venue || ':' || product AS text,
  AVG(funding_rates.rate) * 24 * 365 * 100 AS apr
FROM funding_rates
  LEFT JOIN products ON products.symbol = funding_rates.product AND products.venue = funding_rates.venue AND products.type = 'swap'
  LEFT JOIN tokens ON tokens.symbol = products.base
WHERE
  funding_rates.time >= NOW() - interval '24 hours'
  AND funding_rates.venue IN ($venue)
  AND products.base IN ($base)
  AND products.quote IN ($quote)
GROUP BY funding_rates.venue, funding_rates.product, tokens.collateral_weight

SELECT
  predicted_funding_rates.next_funding_time AS time,
  predicted_funding_rates.venue || ':' || product AS text,
  predicted_funding_rates.next_funding_rate * 24 * 365 * 100 AS "1x",
  predicted_funding_rates.next_funding_rate * 24 * 365 * 100 * (1 / (1 - tokens.collateral_weight)) AS "nX"
FROM predicted_funding_rates
  LEFT JOIN products ON products.symbol = predicted_funding_rates.product AND products.venue = predicted_funding_rates.venue AND products.type = 'swap'
  LEFT JOIN tokens ON tokens.symbol = products.base
WHERE
  predicted_funding_rates.next_funding_time > DATE_TRUNC('hour', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
  AND predicted_funding_rates.product = 'btc-perp'
ORDER BY
  predicted_funding_rates.next_funding_time DESC
LIMIT 1

  predicted_funding_rates.venue || ':' || product AS text,
  predicted_funding_rates.next_funding_rate * 24 * 365 * 100 AS "1x",
  predicted_funding_rates.next_funding_rate * 24 * 365 * 100 * (1 / (1 - tokens.collateral_weight)) AS "nX"
FROM predicted_funding_rates
  LEFT JOIN products ON products.symbol = predicted_funding_rates.product AND products.venue = predicted_funding_rates.venue AND products.type = 'swap'
  LEFT JOIN tokens ON tokens.symbol = products.base
WHERE
  predicted_funding_rates.next_funding_time > DATE_TRUNC('hour', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
  AND predicted_funding_rates.product = 'uni-perp'
ORDER BY
  predicted_funding_rates.next_funding_time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  NOW() - interval '1 hours' AS time,
  funding_rates.venue || ':' || product AS text,
  AVG(funding_rates.rate) * 24 * 365 * 100 AS "1x",
  AVG(funding_rates.rate) * 24 * 365 * 100 * (1 / (1 - tokens.collateral_weight)) AS "nX"
FROM funding_rates
  LEFT JOIN products ON products.symbol = funding_rates.product AND products.venue = funding_rates.venue AND products.type = 'swap'
  LEFT JOIN tokens ON tokens.symbol = products.base
WHERE
  funding_rates.time >= NOW() - interval '1 hours'
  AND funding_rates.product = 'uni-perp'
GROUP BY funding_rates.venue, funding_rates.product, tokens.collateral_weight
